      • localize

        private static void localize(int x,
                             int y,
                             double theta)
        Localises the robot once using the ultrasonic localizer, and once with the light localizer, and sets its location to the given grid coords.
        Parameters:
        x - grid location
        y - grid location
        theta - is angle relative to 0 degrees at the start.

      • navigateThroughTunnel

        private static void navigateThroughTunnel(Navigation navigator)
        Navigates to, and through the tunnel to the launching side.
        Parameters:
        navigator - to determine navigation type.

      • navigateToLaunch

        private static void navigateToLaunch(Navigation navigator,
                                     double x,
                                     double y)
        navigates from the tunnel exit to the launch location.
        Parameters:
        navigator - to determine navigation type.
        x - position to launch from.
        y - position to launch from.

      • launch

        private static void launch(int numLaunches,
                           int speed)
        Launches the ping-pong balls a given number of times at a given speed.
        Parameters:
        numLaunches - is the number of launches to make.
        speed - is the motor speed to launch at.
